abstract: Microsoft has been enthusiastically recommending upgrading to its Windows 10 operating system. But what if you’d rather not?
snippet: Microsoft has been enthusiastically recommending upgrading to its Windows 10 operating system. But what if you’d rather not?
lead_paragraph: Q. Is it true that Windows 10 will be a mandatory upgrade for Windows 7 and Windows 8 users this year? I have been getting the “invitation” to upgrade my Windows 7 computer for months, but have been avoiding it because I like my current system.
